# ypr

## Introduction

[`ypr`](https://github.com/poissonconsulting/ypr) is an R package that
implements equilibrium-based yield per recruit methods. Yield per
recruit methods can used to estimate the optimal yield (Walters and
Martell 2004) of a fish population with one or more ecotypes. The yield
can be based on the number of fish caught (or harvested) or biomass for
all fish or just large (trophy) individuals.

The key life history parameters are

- The growth coefficient (`k`) and mean maximum length (`Linf`) from the
  Von Bertalanffy growth curve
- The length at which 50% mature (`Ls`)
- The length at which 50% vulnerable to harvest (`Lv`)
- The **annual interval** natural mortality rate (`n`)
- The lifetime number of spawners per spawner at low density (`Rk`)

and in the case of ecotypes

- The relative proportion of recruits that belong to that ecotype
  (`RPR`)

The calculations do not account for stochasticity, predator-prey
dynamics, angler responses or density-dependent growth.

## Demonstration

### Schedule

``` r
library(ypr)
population <- ypr_population(Rk = 5, Ls = 50, Rmax = 100, rho = 0.6)
ypr_plot_schedule(population, x = "Length", y = "Spawning")
```

![](reference/figures/README-unnamed-chunk-1-1.png)

``` r
ypr_tabulate_schedule(population)
#> # A tibble: 20 × 11
#>      Age Length Weight Fecundity Spawning NaturalMortality Vulnerability
#>    <int>  <dbl>  <dbl>     <dbl>    <dbl>            <dbl>         <dbl>
#>  1     1   13.9   27.0      27.0 3.13e-56              0.2      3.13e-56
#>  2     2   25.9  174.      174.  2.91e-29              0.2      2.91e-29
#>  3     3   36.2  476.      476.  1.04e-14              0.2      1.04e-14
#>  4     4   45.1  918.      918.  3.46e- 5              0.2      3.46e- 5
#>  5     5   52.8 1469.     1469.  9.95e- 1              0.2      9.95e- 1
#>  6     6   59.3 2090.     2090.  1.00e+ 0              0.2      1.00e+ 0
#>  7     7   65.0 2747.     2747.  1.00e+ 0              0.2      1.00e+ 0
#>  8     8   69.9 3412.     3412.  1.00e+ 0              0.2      1.00e+ 0
#>  9     9   74.1 4065.     4065.  1   e+ 0              0.2      1   e+ 0
#> 10    10   77.7 4689.     4689.  1   e+ 0              0.2      1   e+ 0
#> 11    11   80.8 5274.     5274.  1   e+ 0              0.2      1   e+ 0
#> 12    12   83.5 5816.     5816.  1   e+ 0              0.2      1   e+ 0
#> 13    13   85.8 6310.     6310.  1   e+ 0              0.2      1   e+ 0
#> 14    14   87.8 6758.     6758.  1   e+ 0              0.2      1   e+ 0
#> 15    15   89.5 7160.     7160.  1   e+ 0              0.2      1   e+ 0
#> 16    16   90.9 7518.     7518.  1   e+ 0              0.2      1   e+ 0
#> 17    17   92.2 7836.     7836.  1   e+ 0              0.2      1   e+ 0
#> 18    18   93.3 8116.     8116.  1   e+ 0              0.2      1   e+ 0
#> 19    19   94.2 8363.     8363.  1   e+ 0              0.2      1   e+ 0
#> 20    20   95.0 8580.     8580.  1   e+ 0              0.2      1   e+ 0
#> # ℹ 4 more variables: Retention <dbl>, FishingMortality <dbl>,
#> #   Survivorship <dbl>, FishedSurvivorship <dbl>
```

### Fish

``` r
ypr_plot_fish(population, color = "white")
```

![](reference/figures/README-unnamed-chunk-2-1.png)

``` r
ypr_tabulate_fish(population)
#> # A tibble: 20 × 8
#>      Age Survivors Spawners   Caught Harvested Released HandlingMortalities
#>    <dbl>     <dbl>    <dbl>    <dbl>     <dbl>    <dbl>               <dbl>
#>  1     1    70.1   2.19e-54 4.39e-55  1.76e-55 2.63e-55                   0
#>  2     2    56.1   1.63e-27 3.26e-28  1.30e-28 1.96e-28                   0
#>  3     3    44.9   4.68e-13 9.36e-14  3.74e-14 5.62e-14                   0
#>  4     4    35.9   1.24e- 3 2.48e- 4  9.93e- 5 1.49e- 4                   0
#>  5     5    28.7   2.86e+ 1 5.72e+ 0  2.29e+ 0 3.43e+ 0                   0
#>  6     6    21.1   2.11e+ 1 4.23e+ 0  1.69e+ 0 2.54e+ 0                   0
#>  7     7    15.6   1.56e+ 1 3.11e+ 0  1.24e+ 0 1.87e+ 0                   0
#>  8     8    11.5   1.15e+ 1 2.29e+ 0  9.16e- 1 1.37e+ 0                   0
#>  9     9     8.43  8.43e+ 0 1.69e+ 0  6.74e- 1 1.01e+ 0                   0
#> 10    10     6.20  6.20e+ 0 1.24e+ 0  4.96e- 1 7.44e- 1                   0
#> 11    11     4.57  4.57e+ 0 9.13e- 1  3.65e- 1 5.48e- 1                   0
#> 12    12     3.36  3.36e+ 0 6.72e- 1  2.69e- 1 4.03e- 1                   0
#> 13    13     2.47  2.47e+ 0 4.95e- 1  1.98e- 1 2.97e- 1                   0
#> 14    14     1.82  1.82e+ 0 3.64e- 1  1.46e- 1 2.18e- 1                   0
#> 15    15     1.34  1.34e+ 0 2.68e- 1  1.07e- 1 1.61e- 1                   0
#> 16    16     0.986 9.86e- 1 1.97e- 1  7.89e- 2 1.18e- 1                   0
#> 17    17     0.726 7.26e- 1 1.45e- 1  5.81e- 2 8.71e- 2                   0
#> 18    18     0.534 5.34e- 1 1.07e- 1  4.27e- 2 6.41e- 2                   0
#> 19    19     0.393 3.93e- 1 7.86e- 2  3.15e- 2 4.72e- 2                   0
#> 20    20     0.289 2.89e- 1 5.79e- 2  2.31e- 2 3.47e- 2                   0
#> # ℹ 1 more variable: Ecotype <chr>
```

### Stock-Recruitment

``` r
ypr_plot_sr(population)
```

![](reference/figures/README-unnamed-chunk-3-1.png)

``` r
ypr_tabulate_sr(population)
#> # A tibble: 3 × 7
#>   Type        pi     u    Eggs Recruits Spawners Fecundity
#>   <chr>    <dbl> <dbl>   <dbl>    <dbl>    <dbl>     <dbl>
#> 1 unfished 0     0     286350.     80      159.      3600.
#> 2 actual   0.2   0.08  167831.     70.1    108.      3112.
#> 3 optimal  0.458 0.183  84129.     54.0     63.7     2641.
```

### Yield

``` r
ypr_tabulate_yield(population)
#> # A tibble: 2 × 8
#>   Type       pi     u Yield   Age Length Weight Effort
#>   <chr>   <dbl> <dbl> <dbl> <dbl>  <dbl>  <dbl>  <dbl>
#> 1 actual  0.2   0.08   8.63  7.67   65.8  3112.   2.12
#> 2 optimal 0.458 0.183 11.7   6.87   62.6  2641.   5.82
ypr_plot_yield(population)
```

![](reference/figures/README-unnamed-chunk-4-1.png)

## Information

For more information see the [Get
Started](https://poissonconsulting.github.io/ypr/articles/ypr.html)
vignette.

### Interaction

To interactively explore the effects of altering individual parameters
on the schedule, stock-recruitment and yield see the ypr shiny
[app](https://poissonconsulting.shinyapps.io/shinyypr/).

![A screenshot of the yield from the ypr shiny
app](reference/figures/yield.png)

A screenshot of the yield from the ypr shiny app

## Installation

### Release

To install the release version from
[CRAN](https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=ypr).

``` r
install.packages("ypr")
```

The website for the release version is at
<https://poissonconsulting.github.io/ypr/>.

### Development

To install the development version from
[r-universe](https://poissonconsulting.r-universe.dev/ypr).

``` r
install.packages("ypr", repos = c("https://poissonconsulting.r-universe.dev", "https://cloud.r-project.org"))
```

or from [GitHub](https://github.com/poissonconsulting/ypr)

``` r
# install.packages("remotes")
remotes::install_github("poissonconsulting/ypr")
```

## Creditation

Development of ypr was partially supported by the [Habitat Conservation
Trust Foundation](https://www.poissonconsulting.ca/orgs/hctf.html) and
the [Ministry of Forests, Lands and Natural Resource
Operations](https://www.poissonconsulting.ca/orgs/mflnro.html).

The hex was designed by [The Forest](https://www.theforest.ca).

## Contribution

Please report any
[issues](https://github.com/poissonconsulting/ypr/issues).

[Pull requests](https://github.com/poissonconsulting/ypr/pulls) are
always welcome.

## Code of Conduct

Please note that the ypr project is released with a [Contributor Code of
Conduct](https://contributor-covenant.org/version/2/0/CODE_OF_CONDUCT.html).
By contributing to this project, you agree to abide by its terms

## References

Walters, Carl J., and Steven J. D. Martell. 2004. *Fisheries Ecology and
Management*. Princeton, N.J: Princeton University Press.

# Package index

## Reference Data Parameters

Reference data population parameters

- [`adams_bt_03`](https://poissonconsulting.github.io/ypr/dev/reference/adams_bt_03.md)
  : Adams Lake Bull Trout Population Parameters (2003)
- [`chilliwack_bt_05`](https://poissonconsulting.github.io/ypr/dev/reference/chilliwack_bt_05.md)
  : Chilliwack Lake Bull Trout Populations Parameters (2005)
- [`kootenay_bt_13`](https://poissonconsulting.github.io/ypr/dev/reference/kootenay_bt_13.md)
  : Kootenay Lake Bull Trout Population Parameters (2013)
- [`kootenay_rb`](https://poissonconsulting.github.io/ypr/dev/reference/kootenay_rb.md)
  : Kootenay Lake Rainbow Trout Population Parameters
- [`kootenay_rb_13`](https://poissonconsulting.github.io/ypr/dev/reference/kootenay_rb_13.md)
  : Kootenay Lake Rainbow Trout Population Parameters (2013)
- [`quesnel_bt`](https://poissonconsulting.github.io/ypr/dev/reference/quesnel_bt.md)
  : Quesnel Lake Bull Trout Population Parameters
- [`quesnel_lt`](https://poissonconsulting.github.io/ypr/dev/reference/quesnel_lt.md)
  : Quesnel Lake Lake Trout Population Parameters
- [`quesnel_rb`](https://poissonconsulting.github.io/ypr/dev/reference/quesnel_rb.md)
  : Quesnel Lake Rainbow Trout Population Parameters

## Calculate

Calculations

- [`ypr_age_at_length()`](https://poissonconsulting.github.io/ypr/dev/reference/ypr_age_at_length.md)
  : Age At Length
- [`ypr_exploitation()`](https://poissonconsulting.github.io/ypr/dev/reference/ypr_exploitation.md)
  : Exploitation Probability
- [`ypr_length_at_age()`](https://poissonconsulting.github.io/ypr/dev/reference/ypr_length_at_age.md)
  : Length At Age
- [`ypr_optimize()`](https://poissonconsulting.github.io/ypr/dev/reference/ypr_optimize.md)
  : Optimize Capture
- [`ypr_sr()`](https://poissonconsulting.github.io/ypr/dev/reference/ypr_sr.md)
  : Stock-Recruitment Parameters
- [`ypr_yield()`](https://poissonconsulting.github.io/ypr/dev/reference/ypr_yield.md)
  : Yield
- [`ypr_yields()`](https://poissonconsulting.github.io/ypr/dev/reference/ypr_yields.md)
  : Yields

## Populate

Population Objects

- [`as_ypr_population()`](https://poissonconsulting.github.io/ypr/dev/reference/as_ypr_population.md)
  [`as_ypr_populations(`*`<data.frame>`*`)`](https://poissonconsulting.github.io/ypr/dev/reference/as_ypr_population.md)
  : Coerce to a Population Object
- [`as_ypr_ecotypes()`](https://poissonconsulting.github.io/ypr/dev/reference/as_ypr_ecotypes.md)
  : Coerce to an Ecotypes Object
- [`as_ypr_populations()`](https://poissonconsulting.github.io/ypr/dev/reference/as_ypr_populations.md)
  : Coerce to a Populations Object
- [`is.ypr_population()`](https://poissonconsulting.github.io/ypr/dev/reference/is.ypr_population.md)
  [`is_ypr_population()`](https://poissonconsulting.github.io/ypr/dev/reference/is.ypr_population.md)
  [`is.ypr_populations()`](https://poissonconsulting.github.io/ypr/dev/reference/is.ypr_population.md)
  [`is_ypr_populations()`](https://poissonconsulting.github.io/ypr/dev/reference/is.ypr_population.md)
  [`is.ypr_ecotypes()`](https://poissonconsulting.github.io/ypr/dev/reference/is.ypr_population.md)
  [`is_ypr_ecotypes()`](https://poissonconsulting.github.io/ypr/dev/reference/is.ypr_population.md)
  : Tests if is a Population, Populations or Ecotypes
- [`ypr_population()`](https://poissonconsulting.github.io/ypr/dev/reference/ypr_population.md)
  : Population Parameters
- [`ypr_ecotypes()`](https://poissonconsulting.github.io/ypr/dev/reference/ypr_ecotypes.md)
  : Create Ecotypes Object
- [`ypr_populations()`](https://poissonconsulting.github.io/ypr/dev/reference/ypr_populations.md)
  : Populations
- [`ypr_update()`](https://poissonconsulting.github.io/ypr/dev/reference/ypr_update.md)
  : Update a YPR Object Currently just works with scalar parameters for
  populations and ecotypes.
- [`ypr_get_par()`](https://poissonconsulting.github.io/ypr/dev/reference/ypr_get_par.md)
  : Get Parameter Value
- [`ypr_names()`](https://poissonconsulting.github.io/ypr/dev/reference/ypr_names.md)
  : Population(s) or Ecotype Names
- [`ypr_population_names()`](https://poissonconsulting.github.io/ypr/dev/reference/ypr_population_names.md)
  **\[deprecated\]** : Population Names
- [`ypr_populations_expand()`](https://poissonconsulting.github.io/ypr/dev/reference/ypr_populations_expand.md)
  : Expand Populations
- [`ypr_population_update()`](https://poissonconsulting.github.io/ypr/dev/reference/ypr_population_update.md)
  **\[deprecated\]** : Update a Population Object

## Plot

Generate plots

- [`plot(`*`<ypr_population>`*`)`](https://poissonconsulting.github.io/ypr/dev/reference/plot.ypr_population.md)
  : Plot Population Schedule
- [`ypr_plot_biomass()`](https://poissonconsulting.github.io/ypr/dev/reference/ypr_plot_biomass.md)
  : Plot Biomass
- [`ypr_plot_fish()`](https://poissonconsulting.github.io/ypr/dev/reference/ypr_plot_fish.md)
  : Plot Fish
- [`ypr_plot_schedule()`](https://poissonconsulting.github.io/ypr/dev/reference/ypr_plot_schedule.md)
  : Plot Population or Ecotypes Schedule Terms
- [`ypr_plot_sr()`](https://poissonconsulting.github.io/ypr/dev/reference/ypr_plot_sr.md)
  : Plot Stock-Recruitment Curve
- [`ypr_plot_yield()`](https://poissonconsulting.github.io/ypr/dev/reference/ypr_plot_yield.md)
  : Plot Yield by Capture

## Tabulate

Tabulate values or generate report

- [`ypr_report()`](https://poissonconsulting.github.io/ypr/dev/reference/ypr_report.md)
  : Report
- [`ypr_detabulate_parameters()`](https://poissonconsulting.github.io/ypr/dev/reference/ypr_detabulate_parameters.md)
  : Detabulate Population Parameters
- [`ypr_schedule()`](https://poissonconsulting.github.io/ypr/dev/reference/ypr_schedule.md)
  **\[deprecated\]** : Life-History Schedule
- [`ypr_tabulate_biomass()`](https://poissonconsulting.github.io/ypr/dev/reference/ypr_tabulate_biomass.md)
  : Tabulate Biomass (and Eggs)
- [`ypr_tabulate_fish()`](https://poissonconsulting.github.io/ypr/dev/reference/ypr_tabulate_fish.md)
  : Tabulate Fish Numbers
- [`ypr_tabulate_parameters()`](https://poissonconsulting.github.io/ypr/dev/reference/ypr_tabulate_parameters.md)
  : Tabulate Population Parameters
- [`ypr_tabulate_schedule()`](https://poissonconsulting.github.io/ypr/dev/reference/ypr_tabulate_schedule.md)
  : Life-History Schedule
- [`ypr_tabulate_sr()`](https://poissonconsulting.github.io/ypr/dev/reference/ypr_tabulate_sr.md)
  : Tabulate Stock-Recruitment Parameters
- [`ypr_tabulate_yield()`](https://poissonconsulting.github.io/ypr/dev/reference/ypr_tabulate_yield.md)
  : Tabulate Yield
- [`ypr_tabulate_yields()`](https://poissonconsulting.github.io/ypr/dev/reference/ypr_tabulate_yields.md)
  : Tabulate Yields

## Check

Check objects

- [`check_population()`](https://poissonconsulting.github.io/ypr/dev/reference/check_population.md)
  : Check Population
- [`check_ecotypes()`](https://poissonconsulting.github.io/ypr/dev/reference/check_ecotypes.md)
  : Check Ecotypes
- [`check_populations()`](https://poissonconsulting.github.io/ypr/dev/reference/check_populations.md)
  : Check Populations
